summary.title: BE THE TRENDSETTER - LET YOUR ANDROID OR iOS/APPLE PHONE PROCESS YOUR PAYMENTS
summary.description:
Switch over to Hypna MOBILE PAYMENT System - the radical change in the industry that is cost effective, convenient, with hassle free maintenance, enables business intelligence and secure transactions.
Minimising operational expenses in your business establishment is one of your top priorities. Accordingly, you consider making that high investment on Point of Sales (POS) terminal equipment. A commercial policy, where your merchants must maintain a particular turn over limit for them to be eligible to acquire a POS terminal is another requirement.
A POS device that is simple, cost effective, with minimal maintenance and which enables secure transaction process is what you need.
Then switch over to Hypna point of sales device. You only need your Android or iOS/Apple phone to start off Hypna.

subProd.desc: How to go about:: Simply install the Hypna mobile soft ware, plug the Magnetic Strip Reader or Chip-n-Pin reader to the mobile phone's audio jack and start the mobile payment process. For printing receipts add on the Bluetooth Printer. If it's a signature, then Hypna can capture it with the smart phone handwriting feature.

Guaranteed secure transaction:: We use SSL Virtual Private Networks to transmit data. Authentication is with MD5/SHA Encryption. Records are stamped with IMEI# and SIM#. The Hypna web service REST-ful APIs easily integrates with any Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solution. Hypna complies with Payment Card Industry Standard and has Europe Visa Master Card certification.

Stay informed:: The business analytics tool provides you transaction data on a routine basis. This feature will help you detect any unfavourable situations in your business and for quick responding to maintain the profitability in your business.

Easy maintenance:: Maintenance is hassle free and can be attended to by the local mobile repair shop as Hypna is only an add on software to your mobile. You also have the added benefit of a warrantee for the plug-in components like the Magnetic Strip Reader, Chip-n-Pin reader, and Bluetooth Printer if you have obtained your mobile phone from Spot On.
